lines.text: And one of them would get an opportunity now because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them would, if you were to try and dodge past, yeah. What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have to move anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you. What do you want to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an acrobatics check as you try to tumble in your armor between the legs of one of the guys in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tumbling!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have inspiration?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you do have inspiration! And you'll need it, it looks like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your acrobatics is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With advantage. With triple disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Let me double-check here real fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's going to the book for this. For a somersault!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And isn't this guy technically flanked by enemies now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I'm not going to somersault, I'm going to sneak around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't she run under his balls and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, let the DM DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me deal with it, guys. You don't want to prod me right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chapter three: Somersaults.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All that I have and more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, you do amazing, every week you do amazing and we're all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's two strikes against you, that is a natural 20. And that's going to be a 13.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, well that misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that is a pretty low roll, ten points of slashing damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm alive, I'm alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you at? What're you at?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am at 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you dodge past, get slammed by two blades, you arc around the corner and they're all looking at each other, confused, some of them affected by this magic they aren't expecting, and you rush around and you see in the distance Kevdak, who's now getting shot a couple times, gets set on fire, flames burst up, and he starts screaming out in pain. As you turn the corner, you look over at your Spiritual Weapon, and you can nudge it forward. Right there, its full movement, 20 feet. Go ahead and make an attack with your spell attack modifier. Does not have advantage because he is no longer paralyzed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Go ahead and roll damage. So 4d8 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wow, that's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no, it doesn't fuck around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still halved, but.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah well. C'mon Sarenrae.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 halved, to 12.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, I forget about it too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forget about it too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is how we all feel watching you fight, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a powerful entity whose hatred is now bent on you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can still move a little bit more, right? Because that was only--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you'd like to. You may take more attacks of opportunity, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What, why?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In order for her to move further, you might move out of combat with the other guys that are there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But they're all attacking each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Command move means on their next turn they attack each other. Doesn't mean that they're charmed or dominated.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But how many feet did I move, how many feet am I able to move anyway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would've been ten feet, you can move 15 more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I can move 15 more anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But you will take two attacks of opportunity if you move out of range of these two.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But wouldn't that be included in the attacks that I just took? If I can move 15 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move 25 total because of your tiny feet. You moved ten, you have 15 more feet you can move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your tiny feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I stay? I'll just stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need to heal yourself, dude.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I know, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Barbarians are going now. This one picks up the gauntlet and is going to rush over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And bring it to Kevdak, and he's going to go ahead and hold it there, as Kevdak takes his arm and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the arm still in it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The arm is still in it, yeah. And he looks at it and takes it with his free hand and clutches it to his chest. And looks around at the other ones, says, "We're going." And he--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, was he holding a weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, he has no weapons, his weapon was pulled away from him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought someone brought him his weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, brought the hammer, he brings up the hammer as well, but he doesn't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I thought he was hold--I'm trying, yeah, no, I'm desperately trying to give a reason why this couldn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that one's going to be attacking Pike. Over here, that's two attacks on Pike. That's going to be a 13? And a 14. Rolled really low on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Praise Sarenrae, praise Sarenrae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the growl behind you, and without even turning your head, you slam your shield up and deflect one of the blows. Look over your shoulder and glare at it as another one comes down, and this-- you take your mace and swing it in a wide arc over and slam their blade against the stone wall of the side, deflecting the entire attack. As that's happening, both of those guys go forward. Two and a one. Goes up against one of the peasants and strikes and the peasant ducks out of the way and manages to avoid the attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy here with the giant club goes down and dodges one of the attacks, the other one does come down at 11, yeah, this peasant gets smashed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, was that the little kid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, this was the drunker guy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, he didn't feel it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Died happy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends their turn, it's the druids' turn now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's so many. They all get to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's how they all feel when we attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This female goliath, you can see with these thick braids in the back of her head, pulled into a very, very tight braid down to the lower part of her back, reaches out and grasps. You feel the blood begin to pool in parts of your body and your veins turn dark around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, constitution save, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is real bad. What is that? That's eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Total. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm Kate Moss, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't make that face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 41 points of necrotic damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel the energy pulse through your entire body and it's like all the blood in your body momentarily becomes toxic. Your vision blurs and you feel the dizziness hit you and you almost stumble to one knee but you catch yourself against the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It just halved me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends the druids' turn. Now the blademongers are going to go. All right. These guys are all going to attack each other.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Except for that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they not going to attack him as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, one of them's going to go ahead and attack Pike, because it was the one that wasn't affected by the Command spell. That's going to be a 19. No? Okay!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 13. No. Cannot hit this armored little gnome, who's pushed against the wall, and you're deflecting blows and taking hits against the armor that are denting the front of it, and you're grinning and bearing it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm growling! Arrr!

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: Arr!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is seven-- it hits. They can't hit you but they can hit each other. Two attacks against that guy, and then the other guy. Both hit. So the first guy takes 14. 24 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want us to do something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can. I'm like--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just focus on the mission.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Focus on the mission at hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So these guys here are going to move around the fire, this guy's going to move up here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone's at disadvantage with me, just a reminder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. This guy here is going to go ahead and move one, two, three. And then using Greenbeard, who reaches out and grabs him with his elemental arm and alley-oops him up onto the roof. With the acrobatics roll. Rolls a one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He dies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy gets slammed into the side and falls back to the ground, missing his turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Falls right back down like some other loser that I know of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And that guy there is going to go ahead and strike at the child.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A three. And 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shifty kid, c'mon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a little weasel, he's a little weasel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's going to hit the kid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a scrapper, he's dodgy. No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kid gets cleaved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't save anybody and we killed ourselves.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If we kill everybody, maybe I can raise him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See if he makes his. He fails on a two. He falls prone. Takes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I'm coming. Whoa!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes 12 points of falling damage

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Ah, help."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he does use the rest of his movement to stand back up and is going to take two swings at you, Percy. That's going to be a 23 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to pull my magic shield, actually, I would have to have a 24 AC for that not to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Second one's a natural 20. So the first strike hits you for 12 points of slashing damage. Second strike, double ones on the crit, so that's four, eight points of slashing damage with the second hit. (laughs) I rolled double ones on his crit, that's really frustrating. You're fine with that. All right, that ends their turn, top of the round, Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're standing there now, bleeding profusely, holding the necklace that holds Grog, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to fly over right above Kevdak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a good 50 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's 50. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to Pokeball Grog right out so he can attack straight out of the gate. Just like I would Cannonball Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I am willing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you at death's door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say essentially because you held your action last turn, if you wanted to go ahead and take your action to do a drop attack on this point here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can this be my bonus, so I'm dropping him out is the bonus, and then I still can attack? I mean, it's only a locket. It's not like it's a whole move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say it's your bonus action to do it, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Grog, you were released, falling down to land on top of Kevdak with the bloodaxe in a downward arc.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a big windup as we're coming down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any chance I can make this reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Then they all get advantages against you again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank god for that. Natural. 20. Look at it. The first one was a one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll damage on this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get 'im, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean he gets the three 12s again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the Brutal Critical at this level, how many extra dice is it for you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brutal Critical is one additional damage die during critical hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But then that's gone up since you leveled previously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you are now at, I believe-- so Brutal Critical, yeah, 13 increases to two. So you roll an additional 2d12 on the attack. So roll 1d12 plus, you're not raging anymore, because you spent the last round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, that's three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so plus three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Plus two more d12s.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12. So that's 22. And a ten. For a 32.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then double that? His crits don't get double?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You only double the first roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, double the first, right. Which was ten, so 20, so 42.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (screaming and cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It worked!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poetic justice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I say: For Strongjaw! And I sink the axe right into his neck and part him perfectly down the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the sheer force of the blow, the weight behind it, and the intent, the axe hits him right in the side of the neck, cleaves off part of his ear, shaves off part of his skin here, exposing the jawbone, hits here, breaks the clavicle, tears through, and every single rib is destroyed. It cuts right through the center of this giant body until it gets to about the midsection where it catches, finally. The upper torso splits open and covers you with gore, however, you still impact, not raging.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of fall damage from the impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will put me unconscious and 21 points under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 21 points under. You have that barbarian ability-- Would that be part of this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Relentless Rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You smile as you see his form crumple, and then you (impact) face-first into the ground before him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's next? Oh, I'm still going. It's still my turn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are you dead, Grog?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: He's unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, my only option to heal him is to land and touch him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's surrounded by baddies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Fuck it, I'm going to land and touch Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the speed of the broom?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should say on the broom how fast you can move on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have that somewhere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, in your broom chapter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here we go, I'll find it for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you could use your action to dash with it, you'd land, that's all you could do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I couldn't do anything else? Okay. Then I guess I'm going to stay where I am and-- Jeez. Can I hold my action? I'm going to hold my action until--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's an action to feed a potion to anyone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do, Vex? Hurry up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action until Grog is healed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I-- can I shout anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to shout, witness Grog Strongjaw, and bend the knee!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's great, it's great, it's great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20! (yelling and cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't hit the table, I was going to go inspect it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I hit, I hit, but it was, it was a 20, I swear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I trust you guys. I trust you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have these two-sided dice. Just a one and a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be an interesting night to explain to the internet, guys. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You opened it up to the dice, and the dice decided.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We witnessed, we witnessed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause, a moment of pause. But they've all paid attention to what you said. That ends your turn. It is now the archers' turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not me right after Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, you're up next.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to use disengage to back a little bit away from them, I'm going to scrabble up the wall-- where's the light, no-- I want to go up by Keyleth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're pointing at the screen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you move around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not the first one to do that. And pass her, I want to jump down and land in front of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you run past there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And jump in front of him, between him and-- not Greenbeard, between Grog and everyone over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you'd be leaping, technically onto the body of Kevdak is what you'd be doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Squish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you land onto Kevdak's form, very angry slash, I'll say for the purposes of this you're there, because Kevdak's body is way too big right now to put on the field.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we are so going to loot that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So going to loot that shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we survive this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your hasted movement, make an acrobatics check for the jump.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you scale up, run, leap, land there, feet sinking into the body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I land on him and I say, Kevdak has fallen. Will you let Strongjaw rise? And I hold my action to attack if they come at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's holding their actions right now. It would be Kevdak's turn, Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty far. I'm going to jump down off the roof and move towards Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you run down. Okay. The guy who was up against you has looked over and is not paying attention at this moment. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Stealth check. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. As you rush down the thing, he looks over, looks at you and goes, "Hey. Hey!" And can't even catch you, you're too fast. Make an acrobatics check as you leap off the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. You gnomish three-point-land in this square. You're right next to Pike now, you've landed next to her. As you're around the corner now, you see Scanlan (impact) right next to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got about 15 more feet you can move if you wanted to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Move 15 feet? Okay. I will, can I, I can't take her hand and walk too, she can't move right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well I'm going to continue to walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, I could say if you wanted to, you could move half your movement and take her with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll do that. I'll take her with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you take her hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Healing Word, oh shit, what just happened?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Pike move there, holding each other's hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use Healing Word on Grog, and I'm just going to start chanting, Strongjaw! Strongjaw! Strongjaw!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Strongjaw! Strongjaw! Strongjaw! Strongjaw!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Communicate that as a Healing Word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll the heal on that. I also want you to go ahead and make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heal is eight points. What's that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go to zero, and then eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then persuasion check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. Finishes your turn, Scanlan--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I have an action still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he's willing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say for the purposes of this, because I want to do this, this is ridiculous.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I had to cast that at level six, by the way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it full palm-up, or is it Barcalounger style?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it like a chair?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say Grog is now currently being held aloft right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the hand is clutching Grog Strongjaw, lifting him up into the air, you're conscious now as the hand's holding you on its back and you get up from one knee. Grog, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pinkie's up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pinkie's up. Tea-time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My herd. Hear me. Fallen is your mighty leader Kevdak, the very goliath swine who would have domesticated you like a common household cat, who would have made you bend a knee to a mere dragon. I show you this. And I reach into the Bag of Holding and I pull out one of the dragon's teeth that is still in there and I toss it into the middle of the square.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clatters to the ground at the feet of one of the nearby bladestorms. It stops at his foot. He looks at it, picks it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would tell you that under the correct rule, and a return of power to this Herd, dragons would bend a knee to the Herd of the Storm. Where is Zanror?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all look at each other and Greenbeard hobbles out, still wounded and hurt, into the center of this area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he have an actual name or is that just his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greenbeard's his name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Claiming dominion over a herd that you fell to and left behind for years. Though you struck "down Kevdak, what do you think makes you aligned with the interests of our people?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come to our aid when I call. And with that, we will chase down dragons, gods, and more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, come on, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage on that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck. That's only an 11.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I use War God's Blessing, or?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think it works for abilities.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I assist him with a skywrite 'Strongjaw'?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Bing! Strongjaw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean a stormcloud above him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Inspo, inspo, inspiration from anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little late for that. It's okay. At this point Greenbeard sizes you up from a distance. Everyone else is waiting for a word, you can see everyone is hand on the side of their weapons looking at each other and there's this extremely tense air. Greenbeard turns around and looks to two of the individuals near the front of the building and goes, "Bring out Zanror." And the two of them go inside the door and close it behind them. They step inside the building and there's this long silence. You wait for 30 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I take a healing potion while they're inside? I'm up on the thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I heal Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to step up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can see him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see him, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I'm going to cast Heal on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to cast Heal?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to go for your holy symbol, you can see two of the warriors behind you twitch for their weapons.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold! It is not necessary. Brothers, look me in the eye. Has the taste of food lost its appeal? Has the zest for life fallen from your hearts? Living in this domesticated dwelling. I promise you this: hear me, and I promise you adventures and glory that is worthy of this herd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls out behind him a half-giant woman with the hair on the sides of her head shaved, one single long mane of hair, and it looks like she's with child. Also in shackles. And she's pushed to the ground with Zanror. Zanror looks up and you can see him closing his eyes like the daylight itself is very bright and he probably hasn't seen light in a period of time. "Strongjaw."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cousin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well. This is a surprise."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your face seems a little different.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at this moment that he looks over and glances, and can see the body of Kevdak on the ground for the first time, and then he goes, "You did this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan. Lower me down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I swoop him down. Do you want to be on the ground or just above it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the ground. But I release him and I make a fist that clenches right next to him. Just in case anything goes bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. As you're brought down to the ground, Bigby's Hand sets you gently on the cobblestone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a few steps forward. Yes. This my work. A debt fulfilled after many, many years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Greenbeard immediately steps back and goes, "Look at him in shackles. This isn't a warrior, this is "a slave. Both of 'em." Spits in their direction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strange. I would ask, why is he in shackles? What did Zanror do that would draw this sort of ire from the Herd?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we quelled that right quick. Gave him time to "think about it. His father was deciding what to do with this traitor. And his next of kin. You, "however, seemingly stopped his trial, so I think it's only fitting that you do the honors of "finishing the job." And you can see as you were lifted off the ground and everything, you did not have your weapon with you, as you were on the ground, lifted up. Greenbeard steps over and takes the bloodaxe from the ground, walks up to you, and hands it out, and looks over to Zanror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am sorry, Zanror. But I will make it a glorious death. Bring me the gauntlets as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let it be." And two of the other individuals, one of the half-orc individuals looks over, hushed, and starts backing away from this, this is too much for him. There's now this tribal tension, this cultural tension that only exists within the initial Herd and has been only recently adopted by the Rivermaw that were absorbed by the Herd and are still confused by this. Two of the goliaths step over and pull and pry out the somewhat soggy leftover arm of Kevdak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kind of like when you're eating lobster, to get the claw out, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shrinks as it leaves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They toss it to the ground before you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stand. Put on the gauntlets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kevdak at this point is still being held up by the chains and says--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Zanror.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, Zanror. Thank you. "It was unbefitting of us all to be living under one of "those beasts. Under my rule, we were going to take back our power as a people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I pivot, and I drive the bloodaxe into Greenbeard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit! Roll an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah you do, buddy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Get the fuck out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a fucking natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to have to get these dice calibrated later.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But why does it only happen when it's a story element?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's an 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, let me take a picture, I'll take a picture.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then two more?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Watch next week as we fail to open the door to his house for an hour and a half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yes, can't roll above a five next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 27. 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you got it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He had taken a shit-ton of damage in the battle, and was already moving by--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, he was pretty low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He had like 12 more hit points left, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It seems all the poison came from his head, so I'll remove that from his body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that moment, (swishing), with a very slick snapping sound, the blade coasts through and the neck retreats as the head continues forward and tumbles to the feet as Greenbeard's body takes an instinctual step backward and then falls, lifeless, in the center of the marketplace. All the rest of the Herd moves for a second, nervously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I spin and I say: do you see? Do you see what staying in one place does? This is what weakness looks like. I would return you to the wild. I would return you to power. But you will have to do it under this goliath's rule. Unchain Zanror.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually he stands up, reaches over and puts his arm around her and says, "I am sorry, Worra."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Worra.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Worra. She stands and goes, "Do not be sorry. It seems we've been delivered from our "judgment." She looks up towards you. You don't recognize her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not from the original Herd.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Congratulations.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We claim Westruun home for one more night. For it is tomorrow at dawn, we slam our blades against "the hide of a dragon."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. This is honor. This is pride. This is a life worth living.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Will you join us in this glory and pride, fair cousin Grog? You have proven yourself worthy "of life and respect and the might of the Herd of Storms."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many do you number?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks about and takes in the mental math of all the people that were killed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we didn't kill that many.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, you took a few down. "We'd stand, between the people that were loyal to me and my "father, a good 43 men strong."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: More than we need. And I grab my earpiece and I go, (meekly) thoughts? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we have a busy day tomorrow already, I don't know if we should add dragons to it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're hunting another dragon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just say yes, we can always leave in the dead of night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. All this bloodshed is giving me a terrible itch in my ear. We shall stay with you and tomorrow we will bathe in the blood of a dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He steps forward to you now, there's a slight limp to his walk, but there's too much pride for him to show it as he tenses and reaches out his hands to you and clasps it in his own, Beastmaster-style, holding onto it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, strength and honor!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For the dragons, it shall be."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It shall be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to sever the remaining gristle away from his arm that's holding the gauntlet on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gauntlets have been retrieved. And given to Grog, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I would like to loot Greenbeard's body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you do me a favor? Could you butcher me a skull of Kevdak, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah. I'm going to land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to land, all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to call Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket, who's been hiding in the back room there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because things happened so fast for him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They did happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And there were really strong people!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Already healed him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go over-- are there any remains of the little boy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have anything that can heal the little boy or bring him back somehow, Pike? Key? Anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go and check the little boy. How bad is he? Is he beyond the point of return?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's done.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Resurrect him or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have Raise Dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it turn him into a zombie, or does it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it just raises him from the dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah, do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'll go over to the little boy and see if I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, this will take a while. All right. So, as the rest of herd move on, following Zanror, they begin to separate to gather the rest of the herd throughout the town. A few stay behind, keeping watch--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll assist Pike in any way that I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit and fix my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to cost-- 500 gold are consumed by the casting of this spell as part of the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Takes an hour. So, as you guys take this time, this is a short rest for those of you who aren't part of this ritual. You complete the ritual. Go ahead and make a religion check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, you already boxed up your stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was like, I'm done, I'm out. Peace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: d20, add your religion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, you said you wanted to help. What did you want to help with the ritual on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I said I wanted to help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She was assisting. I was helping with the money.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, sorry, helping with the money. How are you aiding with the ritual?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? How am I aiding with the ritual?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she was casting-- she was preparing the ritual, preparing seals and taking out the components and praying to Sarenrae and speaking the rites, which channel through her in Celestial language. Although she doesn't understand Celestial, she speaks it through as part of the spell, almost like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I speak Celestial.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also speak-- no, I speak Primordial. I keep getting that confused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. How are you aiding in this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can place my hand on his chest and place my other hand on the ground and try and use natural healing to assist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and make a straight wisdom roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I assist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How would you like to assist?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to come over and start listening to the chanting that she's doing in Celestial and harmonize and bring a voice to it since I can actually speak Celestial.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Performance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you finish the ritual, both the voices of Pike and Percy begin to harmonize across these various refrains in a language that, especially when spoken in this rhythmic, ritualistic way, it seems to almost create a third voice. And then you hear, clearly, there is a third voice harmonizing with them that you don't know where it's coming from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's me. I'm off here in the corner. (sings scat)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. I dump a Cure Wounds in him now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay! (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not a potion! I cast Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take it, take it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, (choking sounds).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Grasping Vine and lift him up by the neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shot right in the chest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six years of Celestial, and when are you ever going to use it? It finally pays off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks for helping, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was lovely, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So the child is brought back to life, healed, confused, dazed, but not really understanding the circumstances around him, just happy to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He heals 24 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's good to go. His wounds close, the dried blood's still there, but he seems to be in perfect health at the moment, although a little weak and worse for wear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's your mother, child?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was she here in the square with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, everything went by so fast. They tried to pull them out, but they found me and pulled me "out and brought me here. That's all. There was a fight and a lot of yelling. That's all I remember."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where do you live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Up by the temples."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Well, we'll help you find your family. And maybe while we're there we can see if your grandfather's around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He smiles a little bit. You can still see the dried blood streaks across his face, but you can see past that to the smile that peeks through beneath his dirty face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lift him up and put him on Trinket so we can start walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He laughs and Trinket licks him and takes some of that off and he is excited to be grasping something, although he slides a couple times. You can see he's weak from the remnants of the resurrection spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I give him a boost.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anybody else doing anything for the short rest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to not only remove Kevdak's head, just the upper part, no jaw, just the skull, and I would like to use the bloodaxe to flay the skin around the bear tattoo off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything else to loot off of Kevdak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there is the bloodaxe, there is the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gauntlets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gauntlets, and he has four plus-one enchanted javelins that he did not have an opportunity to use this battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sings) Bag of Holding!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I already called Greenbeard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the plus-one javelins. And I'd like to put the flayed skin in your refrigerated bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So mark that, mark down in your refrigerated bag, flayed bear tattoo of Kevdak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Flayed bear tattoo. Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's disgusting. General leather armor, quarterstaff. You do find one potion of greater healing he did not have the opportunity to try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice. I'm putting that down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all he has on him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to spend the rest of the time that they did that ritual gathering up the bodies, the remains.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to fix my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a tinkering check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just barely. By one point. Did not break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to start a fire--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's already a fire going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's slower-burning embers now. One of the barricades that had been set fire by the Fireball earlier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll stoke it, and then put the bodies on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take the bodies of the dead villagers that had been lost in the battle and the handful of the other combatants that had fallen, and you throw them onto the fire and it crackles and burns over time. The smell of burning bodies fills the space around it for a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a house to procure some items from. And a conversation to have with Zanror at some point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What time of day is it now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any other goliaths in the square that are lingering?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three lingering that are keeping an eye.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I walk over to one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tonight we prepare for an incredible battle. Go. Release any meager prisoners you may have kept. They will do nothing for our fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. These two stay, though. No offense, but you did just kill one of my friends "naught but an hour ago."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did. And your claim is fair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These two?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's these two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There were three Herd members that were keeping an eye--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two of them are goliaths. One of them is human. The human and the other goliath stay behind. The one you talked to walks off and seems to be following through on what you told him to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it Lord Zanror, by the way? I may request an audience with Lord Zanror at some point. With your supervision.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Have at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now Thunderlord Zanror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Thunderlord! I say that in my head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have Pike's dad to find, we've got a house to loot--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got a child to deliver home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you want to look over the items you found on Kevdak?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh fucking shit, yes, may I please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And a unique opportunity to maybe really fuck up a dragon. If we want to be smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's your bloodaxe. And there's your Titanstone Knuckles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Bowing down like he's been knighted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hm? We have a dragon who's going to go pick up a giant package of whatever we give him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, you're right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could make some interesting decisions on what's in that box.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is an interesting point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, do we have to stay in the square, or are we allowed to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Doesn't seem to be anything holding you there other than the ritual that was done. When the ritual's completed, you're welcome to go about what you're doing. At which point you do see as time has passed, a few people start poking through windows, who apparently were either hiding in some of these buildings, and see you guys and check out and then go back into hiding again. The town still has people living throughout it. Many of them stay hidden whenever things move in their vicinity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's our thing? Do we want to achieve anything else tonight or just rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should return this little boy to his family. And see if we can find your grandpa.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the short term, we should be able to walk freely, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So, as you guys gather yourselves, partially rested and breathing a sigh of relief at the not horrible circumstance that nearly transpired there thanks to the luck of the gods in a lot of cases.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't believe we're not all dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way northward through Westruun, toward the temple district, small child at your side with the intent--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On Trinket by your side. And possibly to prepare for whatever the Herd has in store for dawn. And with that, we'll finish tonight's game.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now we're going to have to have another huge conversation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't die! I seriously thought we were all going to die. When he got healed and everything was running--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup. Yup. I was like, we might as well make it cool, because we're dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then we snaked it outta the fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But we had them on the run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, that's exactly what that--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude. Yes. Give it up for the fucking bard. Who has an article in Dear Vox Machina.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, appearing tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no. Kevdak hadn't used his action surge yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kevdak hadn't used his action surge yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Action surge? What does that do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Multi, it's what he does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What I do, where he can take an extra action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can do four attacks in one round with the bloodaxe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he ever get to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Couldn't make his save. His arms were gone by the time he came around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, getting his arms off him, brilliant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus, he had four more superiority die and the riposte ability. So he could--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is riposte?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When a creature misses him with a melee attack, he can use one of his superiority die to do a reaction attack as well. So he could in theory get five attacks in one round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Holy shit. That's that half-fighter side, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's sexy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that Hold Person really changed the dynamic really fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We had a very heated discussion over the earring in that 30 seconds, let me tell you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we had that whole long walk. That was the theory.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think that was the most stressful game I've ever played.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This was incredibly stressful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike almost died, Grog died.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was about to be toast. Two more hits from that guy and that would've been the end of me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was fucking amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a three-hour battle. We did nothing but fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And honestly, mucking it up with the archers helped too, because they were all about to start focus-firing on whoever was visible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So I'm glad we split them up. Getting Grog out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Getting Grog out was key. If you hadn't pulled him out and taken all those attacks of opportunity? You would be gone. They weren't going to stop when you hit zero.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No no, that would've been it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They were going to cut you up until you were dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at that guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The shadow of Craven Edge lives behind those eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. Bunch of dudes. You guys have dragons to deal with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, well, guys, thank you very much for watching. Thanks again for Loot Crate for being awesome and being our sponsor--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you, Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If-- I dunno, if he's still around. Is our guest still around?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, there's no way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't you mention the Loot Crate link again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, we should flash up the Loot Crate link and we'll be tweeting that out later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's ww (stammers), www.Loot Crate.com/criticalrole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So that's five w's?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the code is "criticalrole", not "critrole".

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They didn't coordinate with Wyrmwood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Missed opportunity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's his nerd of the month club.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the best. I have Loot Crate and it's the best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's a bash. Every time around we're like, aha!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, it's like a little present to yourself that you forgot you got.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, anything I don't want, I put into a big bin and, at Christmas, I am Santa Claus to all the kids on the block. It's intense. They all want to know what's up with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's fantastic. All right. Well, in the meantime, we'll be back next week to see what this next chapter in the Westruun portion of this adventure holds. Well done, guys. That's the largest battlefield I've made so far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was an amazing battlefield.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Matthew Mercer.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Dwarven Forge!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we had the pleasure of having Patrick Rothfuss in the office today to watch the game, so wherever you are, Patrick, pleasure to meet you, and maybe we'll drag you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Big fans, big fans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next time you're in LA. So, anyway guys, have a wonderful evening, see you next week, and is it Thursday yet? (cheering) [end of transcript]
